content.p: For online advice try the Studying Effectively web pages and join our Moodle modules. We also have a short online introduction to our services for new staff and researchers (Moodle) [University of Nottingham Malaysia Campus access only] Siew Ling Ng Tel :+60 3 8924 8320 Email:siew-ling.ng@nottingham.edu.my Norhasniza Awang Tel :+60 3 8924 8671 Email:norhasniza.awang@nottingham.edu.my Eng Hooi Kyin Tel :+60 3 8924 8677 Email:HooiKyin.Eng@nottingham.edu.my Hidayatul Robiaisah Safian Tel :+60 3 8924 8316 Email:hidayatul.safian@nottingham.edu.my Elzo Lawrence Tel :+60 3 8725 3406 Email:elzo.lawrence@nottingham.edu.my More formal communication routes include: Please see our contact page for telephone and email contact points.
